data.text: The hotel is just amazing and offers everything possible you can think of. You don’t need to pay for drinks or services. Only for massage, but it is also exciting. It is also very clean and comfortable and the stuff is extremely nice. Greetings to Avina and Aydana. Best experience in a hotel yet.
data.title: The hotel is just amazing and offers everything possible you can think of. You don’t ne or services. The hotel is just am

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
First of all we would like to express our gratitude for your choice of Swandor Hotels & Resorts Topkapi Palace. Reviews about our hotel are very important and help us continuously improve the quality of our service. We would like to remind you that we will always be pleased to welcome you in one of our Swandor Hotels & Resorts.
Best Regards,
Swandor Topkapı Palace Management
owner_response.author: Guest Relatıon

data.text: The hotel is breathtaking! We enjoyed our stay so much! Friendly staff, nice rooms, amazing entertainment - guest relation team managed our stay very comfortable and unforgettable- so we plan to con in 3 months again! Rooms are very clean, comfortable, it made our stay unforgettable! Just in case you need a doctor - the aid was professionally made. Thank you!!! We will come again very soon!
data.title: A perfect accommodation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
While we aim to provide you with better service every day with our guest satisfaction-oriented service approach, our team, each professional in their field, strives to create the most unforgettable and pleasing holiday experience possible for our guests. Hearing that we were able to achieve this made us very happy and motivated. We would also like to thank you for your positive evaluations by taking your valuable time.
We would like to state that we will always be pleased to welcome you again in our hotels within Swandor, where we focus on perfecting all our services by shaping them with the comments of our valued guests.
BestRegards,
Swandor Topkapı Palace Management
owner_response.author: Guest Relatıon

data.text:
So good service, especially on guest relations Valentina and Nagima. You can call 5555 and they help you immediately.

So many activities on territory. But be careful when you choose room. Some room have got not amazing view. 

Food tasty, so many bars territory
data.title: Guest relations

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest
First of all, on behalf of Swandor Hotels&Resort Topkapı Palace family, we would like to thank you for your feedback.
Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experiences with us and other vacation lovers. Such good feedback from you motivates us to do even better work.
 Our aim is that every guest who stays in our hotel feels the Swandor Hotels difference and leaves our hotel with good memories.
We will always be pleased to welcome you back to our hotels!
Best Regards 
Swandor Topkapi Palace Management
owner_response.author: Guest Relatıon

data.text: Engaging activities and very good facilities. Lots of things to do in this hotel. Food and drinks are of good quality and the late night entertainment is excellent. And when I needed some assistance with my stay, Fatima from guest relations was very helpful and professional. Thank you!
data.title: Brilliant Stay

data.text: The resort has excellent facilities and we had a relaxing memorable stay! We will definitely be visiting again! The resort has several activities ( games, live music, swimming, kids friendly activities)! The resort is also close to nearby attractions ( land of legends).
data.title: Excellent resort!
